mapper.insert: insert into cart( CART_ID, AMOUNT , PRODUCT_ID, USERID) VALUES(seq_cart.nextval, #{amount}, #{product_id}, #{userid})
mapper.select:
select sum(price*amount) as money , PRODUCT_ID , product_name ,price, sum(amount) as amount,
PICTURE_URL,PRODUCT_STATE, USERNAME, USERID
from V_CART
WHERE userid=#{userid}
group by product_id, product_name,price, PICTURE_URL,PRODUCT_STATE, USERNAME, USERID
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set AMOUNT =AMOUNT - #{amount} where PRODUCT_ID =#{product_id}
mapper.select: select amount from PRODUCT where product_id =#{product_id}
